title: Berman Tabacco Announces Investigation of OneStream, Inc. (NASDAQ:OS)
text: BOSTON, Jan. 14, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Berman Tabacco, a national law firm representing investors, announces that it is investigating potential stockholder claims on behalf of investors in OneStream, Inc (“OneStream” or the “Company”) regarding a take-private transaction by Hg Capital, General Atlantic, and Tidemark.

title: What Investors Should Know About a $186K OneStream Insider Stock Sale
text: A director at OneStream sold 7,956 shares for $185,436.09 on Tuesday. The sale represented 52.74% of Mariner's direct holdings, as reported, reducing his position to 7,130 shares post-transaction.

title: Pamela Mcintyre Sells 6,505 Shares of OneStream (NASDAQ:OS) Stock
text: OneStream, Inc. (NASDAQ: OS - Get Free Report) CAO Pamela Mcintyre sold 6,505 shares of the business's stock in a transaction that occurred on Thursday, January 8th. title: Onestream (OS) Moves 28.4% Higher: Will This Strength Last?
text: Onestream (OS) was a big mover last session on higher-than-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions might not help the stock continue moving higher in the near term.

title: Shareholder Alert: The Ademi Firm investigates whether OneStream Inc. is obtaining a Fair Price for its Public Shareholders
text: MILWAUKEE, Jan. 6, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Ademi LLP is investigating OneStream (NASDAQ: OS) for possible breaches of fiduciary duty and other violations of law in its recently announced transaction with Hg. Click here to learn how to join our investigation and obtain additional information or contact us at gademi@ademilaw.com or toll-free: 866-264-3995.

title: Dow Jones Today: Major Stock Indexes Surge Further; Dow, S&P 500 Set New All-Time Highs
text: Stocks advanced further Tuesday, a day after major equities indexes ended sharply higher following the weekend capture of Venezuelan president Nicolás Maduro.

title: OneStream to be taken private in “smart” $6.4B Hg Capital deal: Wedbush
text: OneStream Inc (NASDAQ:OS) is set to go private after agreeing to a $6.4 billion all-cash acquisition by private equity firm Hg Capital, in a deal Wedbush described as a “smart move.” Under the definitive agreement, OneStream shareholders will receive $24 per share, reflecting a nearly 31% premium to the company's closing share price on January 5 and a 27% premium to its 30-day volume-weighted average price.

title: OneStream CRO Exercises Options, Sells $688,000 Weeks Before $6.4 Billion Buyout Deal
text: Ken Hohenstein exercised and sold 40,000 shares for a transaction value of $688,400 on Dec. 16, 2025. This transaction represented 2.2% of his total holdings at the time.

title: OneStream to Go Private Through $6.4 Billion Hg Acquisition
text: OneStream shareholders will receive $24 a share, a 31% premium over Monday's closing price.
